name: addWebsiteBinding
friendlyName: Add Binding To Web Site On Remote Computer
description: Task adds binding to web site on remote computer.
author: James Blankenship

inputs.name: webSiteName
inputs.label: Web Site
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the name of the website to create the new binding on.

inputs.name: ipAddress
inputs.label: IP Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the IP address of the new binding. (* for all).

inputs.name: port
inputs.label: Port Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the port for the new binding..

inputs.name: hostHeader
inputs.label: Host Header
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the host header of the new binding.

inputs.name: protocol
inputs.label: Protocol
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the protocol for the new binding. This protocol is usually HTTP, HTTPS, or FTP

instanceNameFormat: Add Binding to Web Site On Remote Computer
